components.label: HTML
components.content: Information related to ethical approval of the project.

components.label: Responsible Member
components.description: Name of the person responsible for the ethical approval.

components.label: Responsible Institute
components.description: Name of the institute granting the ethical approval.

components.label: Protocol Number
components.description: Protocol number of the ethics approval.

components.label: Approving Committee
components.description: Members of the ethical approval committee.

components.label: Start Date
components.description: Start date of the ethical approval.

components.label: End date
components.description: End date of the ethical approval.

components.label: Required Certifications
components.description: List of certifications required as part of the ethical approval. e.g. training in handling animals etc.
